frame.name: Event_instance
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame describes a particular instance of an event.
<ex>These next two days will be the <fex name="Instance_Prop">last</fex> <fex name="Iteration_Count">two</fex> <fex name="Instance"><t>times</t></fex> <fex name="Event">that I'm here</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Instance
FE.definition:
<def-root>The particular <fen>Instance</fen> of a given event. All LUs in this frame incorporate this Frame Element.
<ex><fex name="Event">He dumped trash</fex> for the <fex name="Instance_Prop">last</fex> <t><fex name="Instance">time</fex></t>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Event">He tapped me</fex> <fex name="Instance"><t>twice</t></fex> <fex name="Event">on the shoulder</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Event
FE.definition:
<def-root>The event that occurred in one or more instances.
<ex><fex name="Event">Listen to this song</fex> <fex name="Iteration_Count">six</fex> <t>times</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Instance_prop
FE.definition:
<def-root>A property of the particular <fen>Instance</fen>.
<ex>This is the <fex name="Instance_prop">first</fex> <t>time</t> <fex name="Event">I've grown such delicious tea</fex>.</ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Iteration_count
FE.definition:
<def-root>The specific number of iterations.
<ex>The <fex name="Instance_prop">last</fex> <fex name="Iteration_count">3</fex> <fex name="Instance"><t>times</t></fex> <fex name="Event">I did this</fex>, I lost the game.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Instance_prop">This</fex> <fex name="Iteration_count">one</fex> <fex name="Event"><t>time</t></fex>, at band camp, <fex name="Event">we went to the lake</fex>.</ex></def-root>
